committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Compensation and Employee Benefits

official_title: To provide that General Schedule employees within Monterey County, California, be granted the same interim, locality-based pay adjustments as have been granted to General Schedule employees within the San Francisco Metropolitan Statistical Area.

summary.text: Grants General Schedule employees in Monterey, California, the same interim, locality-based pay adjustments as provided to General Schedule employees within the San Francisco Metropolitan Statistical Area under the Federal Employees Pay Comparability Act of 1990.

titles.title: To provide that General Schedule employees within Monterey County, California, be granted the same interim, locality-based pay adjustments as have been granted to General Schedule employees within the San Francisco Metropolitan Statistical Area.
